data.message: SOOOO AMAZING! Best couple hours of my entire life! Drove all the way from Washington to be there. Even commemorated afterwards with a tatt! (Had to post a picture... Been DYING to brag to some fans like me!) Wish I had the money to go see him again in Detroit and NJ :( Wish I could have gotten closer tickets, too! I could only get tickets in pit 2, and I sat at my computer screen and waited until the exact second tickets went on sale to get them! Still missed out on pit 1 somehow!! Anyone who was in pit 1, I am sooo jealous, and I kinda of hate you! Just sayin! Oh... And you should send me a close up picture of his sexy self!!!!

replies.message: There's nothing in my inbox.. I'm not even sure how to get to the other folder on the mobile app.
